scripts.simulate-worflow-generate-docs: npx resume export --theme dev-ats --format html src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html && wkhtmltopdf src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.pdf && pandoc src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html -o src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.docx
scripts.version-upgrade: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")" && git push -f
